Interface MessageSourceManagementDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageSourceDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleJdbcMessageSourceDao

    @Transactional(readOnly=true,
               propagation=REQUIRED)
public interface MessageSourceManagementDao
extends MessageSourceDao
    MessageSourceManagementDao extends a message source dao with management functionality.

    Author:
